nodes.text: Persappa was a terrestrial planet located in the Persappa system of the Unknown Regions. It was a part of the Rakatan Archipelago, a fragmented group of unaligned planets settled by tribes of the Rakata species after the collapse of the Rakatan Infinite Empire around 25,200 BBY. Persappa featured bubbling brew pools on its surface.

The Rakatan tribe that settled Persappa also brought guard creatures there, including rancors, a species of carnivorous reptomammals originating on the Outer Rim Territories worlds of Dathomir and Ottethan. Due to overbreeding, however, the rancors on Persappa eventually mutated into a variant that was blue-spotted and amphibious, and the creatures lurked in the planet's brew pools.

Persappa was introduced in The Unknown Regions, a sourcebook for the Star Wars Roleplaying Game that was developed by Wizards of the Coast. The Unknown Regions was written by Sterling Hershey, Rodney Thompson, and Daniel Wallace, and was published in 2010.
